sections.text:
RCW 62A.12-101

Short title.

This Article may be cited as uniform commercial code—controllable electronic records.

This Article may be cited as uniform commercial code—controllable electronic records.

[ 2023 c 266 s 1001.]

Construction—2023 c 266: "Nothing in this act may be construed to support, endorse, create, or implement a national digital currency." [ 2023 c 266 s 1201.]

Construction—2023 c 266: "Nothing in this act may be construed to support, endorse, create, or implement a national digital currency." [ 2023 c 266 s 1201.]

Effective date—2023 c 266: "This act takes effect January 1, 2024." [ 2023 c 266 s 1204.]

Effective date—2023 c 266: "This act takes effect January 1, 2024." [ 2023 c 266 s 1204.]

RCW 62A.12-103

Relation to Article 9 and consumer laws.

(a) Article 9A governs in case of conflict. If there is conflict between this Article and Article 9A of this title, Article 9A of this title governs.(b) Applicable consumer law and other laws. A transaction subject to this Article is subject to any applicable rule of law that establishes a different rule for consumers and chapter 19.86 RCW.

(a) Article 9A governs in case of conflict. If there is conflict between this Article and Article 9A of this title, Article 9A of this title governs.

(b) Applicable consumer law and other laws. A transaction subject to this Article is subject to any applicable rule of law that establishes a different rule for consumers and chapter 19.86 RCW.

[ 2023 c 266 s 1003.]

Construction—Effective date—2023 c 266: See notes following RCW 62A.12-101.

Construction—Effective date—2023 c 266: See notes following RCW 62A.12-101.
